div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 996 Kerch' (anc. Panticapaeum), Crimea oblast, Ukraine, c. 1955 or earlier Burial: after 475 B.C. Contents: 7+ AR Panticapaeum: hemidr. and smaller fr. (types of Minns, pl. 5, 3-5; pl. 9, 10) Disposition: dispersed Peus, F. P. L. April 1956, 24-30 Welz, SM 1957, pp. 26-9, illus.
